properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Calumet Harbor IL to Gary IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 3:11AM CST until January 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Gale
Warning, which is in effect from midnight tonight to 9 PM CST
Saturday. The Gale Watch is no longer in effect.

* WINDS...Northeast gales to 40 kt late tonight through Saturday
evening.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...To 16 ft late tonight through Saturday
evening.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...To 21 ft late tonight through Saturday
evening.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are imminent or
occurring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions requires
experience and properly equipped vessels. It is highly
recommended that mariners without the proper experience seek safe
harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 PM CST SATURDAY
